roleset.name: triumph, win
roleset.note: VICTORY-N NOTES: Added by Julia, comparison to 'triumph-v'. No VNcls. (from victory.01-n)

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: Ford officials , for example , crowed about their first-ever Tokyo Grand Prix racing victory .

example.name: args 0 and 3
example.text: The real jury returned days later with a $ 345 million victory for Energy Transportation .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Four years after Clinton's victory over sugary drinks in public schools, they're more widely available than ever.
example.arg: over sugary drinks in public schools

example.name: arg 3 as margin
example.text: Randy Johnson and gave the Mets a thrilling 7-6 victory over the Yankees on Friday night in the first Subway Series game of the year.
